com.tinkerpop.blueprints.util.wrappers.event.listener

Interface GraphChangedListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleGraphChangedListener, StubGraphChangedListener

    public interface GraphChangedListener
    Interface for a listener to EventGraph change events.

    Implementations of this interface should be added to the list of listeners on the addListener method on the EventGraph.

    Author:
    Stephen Mallette
